nodes.text: Darcc's Palace was a Palace constructed on Kashyyyk for Moff Darcc after the Galactic Empire established him as Moff of the Mytaranor sector. The Palace was constructed in Darcc's garrison on a cliff near the city of Chenachochan. The Palace was destroyed in 4 ABY by a group of rebelling Wookiees led by New Republic General Han Solo and his good friend, the Wookiee Chewbacca. Darcc escaped capture or death, however.

Moff Darcc's Palaces must be destroyed in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds during the Chewbacca campaign. The campaign and thus Palace also appears in the game's 2002 expansion pack, Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns.
